4. Foetal Heart Sound (FHS) and Rate (FHR)
 ∙ FHS is heard per abdomen by stethoscope/fetoscope 
after 24 weeks of pregnancy
 ∙ Normal FHR is 120-160 beats per min
 ∙ FHR < 120 beats per min or > 160 beats per 
minindicates foetal distress and calls for referral
 ∙ Best heard on the side of the back of the foetus
 ∙ In vertex presentation FHS is best heard midway 
between th
